attributes.additional_details:
This petition aims at letting people know about a simple fact:


MOHAMMED, PROPHET OF THE ISLAMIC CULT, ‘MARRIED’ HIS FOURTH WIFE, A LITTLE GIRL CALLED AISHA, SHE WAS 9 YEARS OLD.



Go anywhere in the web to check the above information, thousands of documents on the internet discuss under age sex and domestic exploitation via under age marriage from the moment of the puberty. By hundreds, amongst them very followed and recognised, preachers of Islam, paedophilic marriages are justified, praised and recommended.




This is happening in every country and in the UK.




 And sign here to make the direct or indirect teachings of paedophilic acts explicitly anti-constitutional in the UK, in Europe and elsewhere, we will campaign without borders.
